name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Preheat skillet over medium heat
Generously butter one side of a slice of bread
Place bread butter-side-down onto skillet bottom and add 1 slice of cheese
Butter a second slice of bread on one side and place butter-side-up on top of sandwich
Grill until lightly browned and flip over, continue grilling until cheese is melted

name: Egg Salad Sandwich
instructions: In a small bowl, combine the first 3 ingredients
Gently stir in eggs
Spread over toast slice, top with spinach and remaining toast

name: Egg Fried Rice
ingredients: 4 eggs, beaten with a pinch of salt
instructions: Heat a wok or a skillet over high heat; add 1 tbsp cooking oil and swirl to coat
Pour beaten eggs into the wok and scramble
When the eggs are cooked 3/4 way, add remaining 2 tbsp cooking oil and cold jasmine rice
Breakdown rice and mix it with eggs
Add soy sauce around the edge of the wok
Add salt to your taste and mix everything well
Turn off the heat, stir in green onions

name: Burrito
instructions: In a large microwave-safe bowl, toss together cooked rice and fresh chopped cilantro, and drizzle with the lime juice
Heat in the microwave or on the stove just until hot, and give it a quick stir
In a separate large skillet, saut√© the onion in vegetable oil or olive oil for 5 minutes, or until the onion is soft
Add the garlic and cook another minute
Reduce the heat to medium-low, add the black beans or pinto beans, and season with the chili powder, cumin, and hot sauce, stirring to combine
Spoon the cilantro-lime rice and the black bean mix onto lightly warmed flour tortillas
Wrap the burritos: Fold the short ends in, then fold one long side over the filling and gently push to ensure the fold is tight before rolling up the remainder of the burrito

name: Pizza
instructions: In large bowl, mix first 4 ingredients
Mix water and oil; add to flour mixture
Turn onto floured surface; knead for 2 minutes
Place in a greased bowl; turning to grease top
Cover and let rise for 20 minutes
Punch down; place on 12in, greased pizza pan
Pat into a circle
Topping: Mix first 5 ingredients and spread over crust
Put a few pepperoni slices on top of sauce
Sprinkle with 1/2 the mozzeralla; 1/2 the monterey jack, and 1/2 the parmesan
Put the rest of the pepperoni on
Repeat the cheese layer
Bake at 400* for 20 minutes or until light brown
